description:
The Vega homeworld is becoming unstable due to the exploiting of Vegatron, a powerful radioactive ore. Seeking to expand his militaristic empire and find a substitute planet to settle upon, the ruthless King Vega unleashes his armies - composed of flying saucers and giant robotic monsters - and turns first against neighbours such as Fleed, a highly advanced but peaceful world. In a tragically ironic twist, the invaders` blitzkrieg turns against them: the once verdant, idyllic Fleed is turned into a radioactive wasteland. Too late, the only known survivor of the royal family, Prince Duke Fleed, manages to steal the Grendizer, the robotic embodiment of the Fleedian God of War, from the Vegan invaders who plan to use it to spearhead their invasion fleet.
Fleeing Vegan space by flying at faster than light speed, Duke enters the Solar system and switches course to Earth, making a rough landing in Japan, on the slopes of Mount Fuji ...
Source: Wikipedia
Note: Episode 49 was also shown at the Toei Manga Festival event on 19.12.1976 under the changed title Akai Yuuhi no Taiketsu (赤い夕陽の対決).

REGULAR.description:
Kouji Kabuto tries his TFO made of Chogokin. When flying, he is attacked by the UFOs of Vega. Fortunately Duke Fleed arrives on time to save the day (but not too quickly nonetheless). Kouji does not actually know that Duke Fleed is the prince of Fleed.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 兜甲児とデュークフリード

REGULAR.description:
Kouji discovers the identity of Duke Fleed, but has no time to ask questions because Vega attacks. Duke Fleed and Kouji unite their power and push back the enemy.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Ah! My Land That Was So Green
ああ!! わが大地みどりなりき

REGULAR.description:
Danbei Makiba organizes a party at the ranch and invites Kouji and Duke Fleed. The latter has no time to eat anything because Vega attacks. Will he have the time to make it to Grendizer before the earth is ravaged? All bets are open...
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Danger at the White Birch Ranch

REGULAR.description:
Gandal wants to discover the hiding place of Grendizer. So he launches a massive attack. Kouji tries to confront the enemies alone, but he only succeeds to crush himself on a deserted island. Finally, Duke Fleed makes it there and saves the day.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Spirit of Youth Is Burning

REGULAR.description:
Kouji, Hikaru, Goro and Banta are taken hostage. Duke Fleed interrupts his siesta to free them.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Love in the Evening of Glory
炎の愛を夕陽に染めて

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru leaves for Tokyo with Banta. Their bus is attacked by a Saucer Beast. Kouji distracts the monster until Duke Fleed arrives since Grendizer has trouble to start up in winter.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Fighting Spirit Heads Towards Space

REGULAR.description:
Gorman, from the fearsome Ruins` Division, attacks Grendizer that is powerless in front of the brutality and the agility of his enemy.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Even If I Lose My Life
たとえ我が命つきるとも

REGULAR.description:
Blacky sets a trap to Grendizer by hiding mines in a cloud of spatial dust. Kouji falls in the trap. Fortunately Duke Fleed helps him and destroys the Golgoth 8.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Greenery of Earth Is Warm
地球の緑はあたたかい

REGULAR.description:
Kouji is captured with his UFO by the Vegans. Grendizer attacks the camp of the Black Moon to save him.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Le camp de la lune noire
تغلب على الغضب غير المسموح به
許されざる怒りを越えて

REGULAR.description:
An inhabitant of the planet Ruby is contacted by Vega to explode the UFO carrier of Grendizer. The mission fails because of Duke Fleed and the Vegans try to kill the Rubinian. But Duke Fleed flies to his help.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: あこがれは星の彼方に

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans plan is to bring Grendizer to the shadow of the moon during the eclipse because Grendizer`s systems will shut down temporarily under it and then destroy it.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Le jour où le soleil s`arrêta
The Evil Ones in the Black Sun

REGULAR.description:
Daisuke and Kouji are sent to investigate an avalanche and to find survivors. They find a girl named Miyuki who lost her memory. Back at the Space Science Lab she begins to remember how a saucer destroyed her home.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: A Girl Crosses the Rainbow Bridge

REGULAR.description:
A new Vegan mecha comes to destroy Earth. It sucks power from the sun and burns everything in its path. Grendizer is damaged by it and has to withdraw. As the mecha attacks again Grendizer has to go to battle weaponless.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Par le fer et par le feu
狙われたグレンダイザー

REGULAR.description:
Boss, Nuke, and Mocha are in this episode. They are visiting their old friend Kouji Kabuto. The Vegans keep their eyes on a mysterious orange robot that is found skiing nearby. Commander Blacky orders the Minifo to follow and investigate it.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: ボスボロットがやって来た!!

REGULAR.description:
Commander Yara is forced to create a mecha that creates earthquakes and use it on the city Kanto.
Source: tv.com

A Vegan pilot lands near the Space Science Centre and makes Mr. Hayashi`s fiance, Kaori, a spy for him. She takes Dr. Umon as a hostage.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Bell of Love That Resounds in the Heart
こころにひびく愛の鐘

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans begin building a base for their operations on Earth. The saucer "Giba Giba" begins to attack but Grendizer comes to save the day by saving a town and a mountain.
Source: tv.com

Dr. Umon made a project so that Grendizer is able to launch without revealing his whereabouts to the enemy. Kabuto is in the control of the Vegans and fights Duke.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Launching of the Secret Route Number 7

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans are causing a shower of asteroids heading towards Earth. The meteors are detected and Grendizer launches to intercept them before they hit land.
Source: tv.com

Daisuke gets the suspicion that the Vegans may be planning to pull the moon down to Earth. Duke Fleed launches Grendizer and follows Kouji who already went to explore the area of Mount Kirofoki.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Escape from the Snow-Covered Mountain

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans plan to melt ice in the North Pole. This will cause the sea level to rise with catastrophic results to the shores on Earth.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 決戦! オーロラの輝き

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans are planning to steal Dr. Chibana`s new device so that they can use it to silence Duke Fleed and his Grendizer.
Source: tv.com

The Vegans continue their attempts to discover Grendizer`s secret hideout as they are sure that the Space Science Centre has something to do with it. Hikaru finds out who Daisuke really is.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Hikaru Calls for Help Across the Rapids

REGULAR.description:
Commander Whiter successfully sneaks into Earth as Dr. Space who is a well-known acquaintance of Dr. Umon and a reliable person so he can find Duke Fleed and kill him.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 危うしデュークフリード!

REGULAR.description:
Duke Fleed`s childhood friends Naida, brainwashed by the Vegans, attempts to put a bomb on Grendizer but Duke stops her. Naida accuses Duke of being a traitor. Kouji attempts to pilot Grendizer but is almost killed.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: A Flower of Love Bloomed in the Sky

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Umon sends Kouji and Hayashi on a mission in outer space to build a satellite station. At the same time, the Space Science Centre is surrounded by a huge Minifo saucer squadron.
Source: tv.com

Grendizer`s delicate weapon systems malfunction and he finds himself struggling against the enemy. The Vegans arrive and descend upon the Center. Hikaru and Daisuke must fix Grendizer and save the Center.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 猛攻撃! グレンダイザー

REGULAR.description:
General Zuril is a brilliant scientist who will try to find different ways of taking down Grendizer. Daisuke, Hikaru, and Goro are attacked by Vegans. Danbei puts on his gear and begins fighting them too.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Bell of the Devil in the Dark
闇夜に響く悪魔のベル

REGULAR.description:
Vegans shrink the cells of the living body to make Haruk become a young boy for a time so he can spy at Space Science Centre. Haruk and Goro become friends but later the effects of the shrinking begin to wear off so Haruk captures Goro.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Farewell, My Friend of the Universe!

REGULAR.description:
A strange rock full of radiation energy lands on Earth and Dr. Umon can`t make much of this new phenomenon. At the same time, the Vegans discover this strong source of energy and put it to use in their next saucer beast.
Source: tv.com

The Boss, Kouji, and Bunta go to the Boss Borot to begin their counterattack of the Vegan attack on them but will face some technical difficulties. Grendizer gets into some trouble while trying to help them but the Boss Borot will help Grendizer in the funniest way but will lose his Boss Spazer.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: A Flower Blooms in the Sky! Boss` Friendship
空に花咲け! ボスの友情

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans send a woman by the name of Marian who looks identical to Duke Fleed`s mother who passed away on planet Fleed.
Source: tv.com

The Vegans send a bird named "Zari Zari" to destroy Grendizer, but Duke remembers a similar bird from his home planet Fleed and will use this knowledge to go and finish it off.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 必殺! ミュータントの最後

REGULAR.description:
Vega promised Commander Gauss that if he kills Duke Fleed then Vega would spare the Wolf Planet from Vegan brutality.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Wolf`s Tears Are Falling Stars

REGULAR.description:
General Gandal assigns Commander Beetle with his saucer beast to attack the Space Science Centre from underground. Meanwhile, Kabuto Kouji`s new Double Spazer ship has just been completed and Kouji is ready to be air-born again.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 飛べ! ダブルスペイザー

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Umon calls Daisuke and Kouji to show them the way that Grendizer and Double Spazer can unite together and fly. The objective of this is to minimize the need for Grendizer to have to lock in and out of Spazer as these are Grendizer`s weakest moments and he is helpless in them.
Source: tv.com

The Vegan plan is to steal a huge capsule full of Super Uranium from Earth. Vegan forces are dispatched immediately to do just that.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Bet Everything on the Wings of Life!

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru becomes a pilot. Duke Fleed faces another Vegan saucer beast loaded with Vegatron rays, and Kouji nearly gets captured by the Minifo after gathering the energy but manages to escape very injured.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: ひかる, 涙のドッキング!

REGULAR.description:
Danbei tells Daisuke that his daughter is outstanding and capable of helping him and Kouji. Daisuke disagrees insisting that war and sport are two different things. Finally Daisuke will allow Hikaru to be part of the team after her vital help.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: A Surprise Assault Triggered by Planet Vega`s Forces!
奇襲! ベガ星突撃隊

REGULAR.description:
A series of explosions start to occur under the sea and General Zuril wastes no time in discovering that this is raw Uranium. Saucer beast "Boi Boi" is launched to go and get this energy as this saucer beast naturally collects Uranium. At the same time Dr. Umon is alerted by these explosions which are close to an island with a Uranium capsule.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Crash! The Ocean Is on Fire

REGULAR.description:
Hikaru loses her consciousness during training and Duke Fleed gets injured and his old wound gets worse. The Vegans begin their attack and Daisuke goes to the battle even though he is injured.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Launching of the Marine Spazer!
マリンスペイザー出動せよ!

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Umon`s Space Science Center is undergoing some major changes to keep up with Vega`s attacks. A super computer is installed in the base, and turning it on will be the final step. The Vegans plan to get rid of the base and leave Grendizer without a place to hide.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: An Emergency Situation in the Space Science Center!
危機! 研究所よ立ちあがれ

REGULAR.description:
A strange meteor heads slowly towards Earth and Kouji will go unilaterally and see what it`s all about. After nearly getting blinded by a ray that came out of the meteor, Kouji`s Double Spazer begins to exit the Earth`s atmosphere.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 隕石落下! 謎の孤島

REGULAR.description:
A young man by the name of Hiyoshi is very interested in searching for ancient evidence to prove that spacemen came to Earth in the past. He goes to look at walls in a near-by cave for ancient scripts to prove his theory, but the villagers think he is crazy. Hundreds of years ago, the Vegans had sent some of their people to Earth. There still is a metal on the wall that they used for landing, and this metal cannot be detected by the radar.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Night of the Celebration with the Saucer Beast!
祭りの夜円盤獣が来る!

REGULAR.description:
With his telescope, Goro spots a meteor that splits in two with each piece landing in a different mountain. These actually contain eggs of the Vegan ants. When Goro tells everyone about it he is not taken seriously. Soon Grendizer and Drill Spazer will unite to face the new danger.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 燃えろ! ドリルスペイザー

REGULAR.description:
Vegan robot sharks land one night and are hidden in a public pool for their next plan. Kouji finds himself a hostage of the Vegans who tell him about their plans to take all of the people as hostages.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 空からサメが降ってきた!!

REGULAR.description:
Danbei induces a race between Daisuke and Kouji. Kouji takes it to seriously. The group goes camping near a lake. Vegans begin to descent in the lake and then the Space Science Center suddenly gets attacked by missiles from the near-by lake where the Vegans stay hidden.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 湖が地獄の火を吐いた!

REGULAR.description:
Duke Fleed unites with Kouji and the Drill Spazer to chase a Vegan saucer beast. The Vegans make an acid swamp to sink the Space Science Center.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Devils from the Depth of the Earth!

REGULAR.description:
Maria tries to kill Duke, thinking the person who pilots Grendizer is evil but during the fight Duke`s necklace falls off and the siblings discover who each other is.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: I Saw My Brother in the Red Sunset!
رأيت أخي في غروب الشمس الأحمر

REGULAR.description:
Maria, the new member on the team, is able to control Grendizer and Marine Spazer. She also has the ability to foresee events so she is able to save Kouji from Vegans.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 暗殺!! 兜甲児を消せ

REGULAR.description:
The Vegan plan is to make this moon enter the Earth`s atmosphere and cause a catastrophe. The battle between Vegans and Grendizer takes longer than anticipated and it is too late for Grendizer to fire the missile.
Source: tv.com

General Zuril orders a powerful attack with his latest saucer beast "Domo Domo" to defeat Grendizer before General Dantos gets the chance.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Exodus of the Army of Vega Daio!

REGULAR.description:
Grendizer is damaged and Hikaru got captivated. Duke Fleed follows Hikaru on foot and helps her to escape from the giant beast while Kouji takes Grendizer back for repairs.
written by: nadeschda

titles.title: قتال حتى الموت مع وحش فيجا
死闘! キングゴリを倒せ

REGULAR.description:
The Vegan built a base underwater knowing that Grendizer cannot withstand depths great than 400 meters.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Terror in the Depths of the Sea in Japan!
謎の恐怖! 日本海溝

REGULAR.description:
Vegans gather some fuel from an industrial island. General Zuril instructs General Gandal on what to do but he doesn`t listen and he gets into trouble because his unilateral action revealed that the Vegans have a base on Earth.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 襲撃! 恐怖の怪気球

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Umon launches a satellite into space to track Vegan movements on Earth.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: A Fake Doctor Causes a Crisis!

REGULAR.description:
Kouji and Maria are on their vacation in Tokyo. They get into a fight as usual and split up.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 吼えろ! ぼくの怪獣

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans make a false Grendizer that attacked Earth people so the real Grendizer will be hated.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Appearance of a Fake Grendizer!
悪魔にされたグレンダイザー!

REGULAR.description:
A group of Vegan kids come to Earth and hold the people inside the observatory hostage.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: ああ! 少年コマンド隊

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans attract a huge number of rats to use for their next mission. These rats are implanted with Vegatron bombs for the purpose of blowing up different targets in Tokyo.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Tokyo Tower Will Be Destroyed at 7pm!
قلعة طوكيو ستدمر الساعة السابعة مساءً
午後七時東京タワー大爆発!

REGULAR.description:
Toko 1, Toko 2, Toko 3, and Toko 4 are Vegan agents taking appearances of other people trying to destroy the Space Science Center.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: The Vegastos Plan with the Spies!

REGULAR.description:
Swans are implanted with Vegatron missiles for the next Vegan plan. Duke Fleed is forced to kill the swans and must head to the city and face saucer beast "Go Go".
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 戦慄! 白鳥が来た日

REGULAR.description:
Kirika, a Vegan scientist, is sent to freeze Duke Fleed with her new weapon.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 雪に消えた少女キリカ

REGULAR.description:
The Vegans invent a bomb and General Gandal threatens to blow up Tokyo if Grendizer does not surrender.
Source: tv.com

The Vegans fire a big group of missiles towards Tokyo. The Grendizer Team launches to destroy the missiles before they hit the city.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Kabuto Kouji in a One-Game Match!

REGULAR.description:
Maria in the Marine Spazer gets stuck in a giant seaweed trap and Kouji swims to the bottom of the sea to help her.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Death at 400 Meters Below Sea Level!
La mort vient de la mer
الموت تحت سطح البحر بـ 400 متر

REGULAR.description:
General Zuril launches an attack on the Space Science Center with air balloon bombs. Kouji gets caught by the Vegans and is held as a hostage.
Source: tv.com

A young man from Fleed named Kane is a loyal soldier of the Vegans. He comes to Earth to fight. Maria tries to face him and they both crash. Soon she will realize that Kane was her childhood friend from Fleed.
Source: tv.com

The son of Zuril,Zuril Jr. wants to fight Grendizer but Zuril doesn`t want him to. Zuril Jr. sacrifices himself for his father in the end.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: An Aurora of Love Dedicated to His Father
父に捧げる愛のオーロラ

REGULAR.description:
Maria has a nightmare about her father being taken hostage. She goes to the cave where she saw her father in her dream along with Kouji where she learns the truth.
Source: tv.com

Moros, Duke`s best friend from Fleed was made to believe that Duke Fleed destroyed Fleed by Vega and now comes to Earth to kill Duke.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 悲劇の親衛隊長モルス

REGULAR.description:
Princess Rubina, Duke Fleed`s fiancé comes to Earth to tell Duke that his planet is no longer polluted but dies after being shoot by one of Vega`s generals.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: A Citizen from a Distant Planet
Rivoluzione nello spazio - Il sacrificio di Rubina

REGULAR.description:
King Vega prepares to attack Earth but Duke and company are ready to stop him with the help of Grendizer and the Spazers.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: この美しい地球のために

REGULAR.description:
Duke finally destroys King Vega but he and Maria must return to planet Fleed.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: 永遠に輝け! 二つの星
Special episodes in cinemascope format for Japanese cinemas
UFOロボ グレンダイザー
Fleed, Ο πρίγκιπας του διαστήματος (Fleed, the prince of the universe)
